data.title: Le Palais des dessins animés
data.text: Audio Orchestral score 2.0; French narration 2.0 Audio Orchestral score 2.0; French narration 2.0 Audio Orchestral score 2.0; quintet arrangement 2.0, 5.1 Extras Short films Der Scheintote Chinese (1928, 13 min.), Aladin und die Wunderlampe (Aladdin and the Magic Lamp, 1954, 10 min.), Das Zauberpferd (The Magic Horse, 1954, 17 min.); interview Die Frau hinter den Schatten (The Woman Behind the Shadow, 1981, 17 min.); booklet with biography, filmography, notes about restoration and music, original poster, première invitation Audio Orchestral score 2.0; English narration 2.0 Extras Documentary Homage to the Inventor of the Silhouette Film (1999, 60 min.); advertisement film Das Geheimnis der Marquisin (The Marquise's Secret, 1921) Audio Orchestral score 2.0; English narration 2.0 Extras Documentary Homage to the Inventor of the Silhouette Film (1999, 60 min.) Audio Orchestral score 2.0; English narration 2.0 Extras Documentary Homage to the Inventor of the Silhouette Film (1999, 60 min.); advertisement film Das Geheimnis der Marquisin (The Marquise's Secret, 1921) Extras Booklet with explanations of the 17 films Documentaries Lotte Reinigers Kunst (Lotte Reiniger's Art, 1953), Ein Scherenschnittfilm entsteht (A Scissor-Cut Film Develops, 1971), The Silhouette Art of Lotte Reiniger (1971); booklet Extras Documentary "The Art of Lotte Reiniger" (1970, 16 min.), Mike Figgis' selection (from Sky Arts' Friday Night Hijack, 2008); illustrated booklet Audio Orchestral score 2.0; quintet arrangement 2.0, 5.1/German/English 1.0
